title: Can We Show Ping To All Chat So that they would know that we are lagging.
body: I just think we need this option so that we can let the enemy side know that were lagging.{{summoner:31}}

replies.body: I think we should have the option to mute pings in game.
All: Hi, guys! I have a 2000 ms latency. Please come make me 0/10, knowing I can't fight you back. Thanks.
Honestly believe it or not that will end badly for you. If they know you are lagging they will camp you even more
